text: Yuriy Olegovich Tkachenko (; born 12 November 1972, Bolhrad, Odessa Oblast) - Ukrainian economist, businesspeople who was from 15 March 2014 until 20 November 2018 the head of the Cherkassy Oblast State Administration.Turchynov appoints Heads of Cherkasy, Chernivtsi and Khmelnytsky regions, Kyiv Post (18 March) Poroshenko appointed two new governors, Ukrayinska Pravda (9 September 2014)Poroshenko appoints new governor in Cherkasy region, UNIAN (20 November 2018) == Awards == * Orders of Merit, III class.Указ Президента України № 620/2009 ==References== == External links == * Yuriy Tkachenko at the Official Ukraine Today portal Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Cherkasy Oblast Category:Ukrainian businesspeople Category:Recipients of the Order of Merit (Ukraine), 3rd class
title: Yuriy Tkachenko
